content.paragraph: In each State of Australia there are governing bodies responsible for the administration of each respective Occupational Health and Safety Act. In general, all Occupational Health and Safety legislation includes requirements for:

list.point: Promoting occupational health and safety in the workplace
Providing systems of work that are safe and without risk to health
Protecting the health and safety of the public in relation to work activities
Rehabilitation and maximum recovery from incapacity of injured workers.
